titles.title: A bill to extend the temporary suspension of duty on vulcanized rubber lug bottom boots for actual use in fishing waders.
A bill to extend the temporary suspension of duty on vulcanized rubber lug bottom boots for actual use in fishing waders.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend the temporary suspension of duty on vulcanized rubber lug bottom boots for actual use in fishing waders.
